articles.title: Tata Technologies IPO LIVE Updates: Offer subscribed 6.55 times on day 1, retail quota at 5.44 | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Tata Technologies IPO LIVE Updates: Tata Technologies IPO price band has been fixed in the range of  ₹475 to  ₹500 per equity share of face value of  ₹2. At the upper end of the price band, Tata Tech IPO is expected to raise  ₹3,042.51 crore

articles.author: David Nield
articles.title: Earth Has Received a Message Laser-Beamed From 10 Million Miles Away - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Eventually, we're going to want to expand the World Wide Web across the galaxy, and NASA just demonstrated a key piece of tech that could help, beaming messages via laser across a distance of almost 16 million kilometers or 10 million miles.
